pub.citation: Callmander, M. W. et al. 2003. Recognition of Martellidendron, a new genus of Pandanaceae, and its biogeographic implications. Taxon 52: 747-762.

pmmd.notes: Phylogram of one of the eight most parsimonious trees from combined data of cpDNA analyses based on 22 exemplar species of Pandanaceae. Above branches: jacknife values if greater than 50%; branches that collapse in the strict consensus tree are indicated by *. Below branches: decay index. Clade A magnified five times in the right box to better show the jackknife and decay indices.
